attributes.action: Close our boarders and introduce an immergration system similar to canada, usa and australia and do not allow asylam seekers into britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: britain is being flooded by people seeking asylam and emmergrating to seek work and abetter lifestyle, we should focus on sort out the problems we have rather than supporting those how cannot support themselves or bring a trade to the uk that is beneficial to us.
